component.name: RCompare
component.summary: Advanced file and directory comparison tool

description.p: RCompare is a powerful file and directory comparison utility inspired by Beyond Compare, built with Rust for high performance and a PySide6 frontend for a native KDE experience.

ul.li: Folder comparison with detailed diff status
Text diff with syntax highlighting and side-by-side view
Image comparison with pixel-level diff detection
CSV, Excel, JSON, YAML, and Parquet file comparison
Profile management for reusable comparison configurations

screenshot.caption: Folder comparison view showing file differences

description.p: PySide6 GUI frontend and KDE compliance improvements

ul.li: New PySide6-based GUI with KDE-compliant menus and shortcuts
Extended CLI JSON output for all diff types
Menu restructure: File, Edit, View, Tools, Settings, Help
Standard KDE shortcuts: F1, F3, Ctrl+T, Ctrl+W, Ctrl+,
